content: आनंदः [आनंद् --घञ्] {@--1@} Happiness, joy, delight, pleasure; आनंदं ब्रह्मणो विद्वान्न बिभेति कदाचन supreme bliss or felicity; आनंद एवास्य विज्ञानमात्मानंदात्मानो हैवं सर्वे देवाः <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> {@--2@} God, Supreme spirit (ब्रह्म) (said to be {%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the forty-eighth year of the cycle of Jupiter. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Balarāma (according to Jaina doctrines). {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a cousin and follower and favourite disciple of Buddha Śākyamuni, compiler of the Sūtras. {@--8@} A variety of the Daṇḍaka metre. --दा, --दी <ab>N.</ab> of two plants. --दं {@--1@} Wine, liquor. {@--2@} A kind of house.
